title: Shopping and Services 2
sentences: I have to pay the restaurant bill.
Can you give me the invoice for my purchase?
The ATM is not working today.
I'm going to the dry cleaner to clean my coat.
Where is the counter/window to buy tickets?
abre a las ocho y media.
I have to renew my driver's license.
How much is the total of the purchase?
The shop is closed for holidays.
I need a gift card for my friend.
viene mañana para arreglar el grifo.
The plumber is coming tomorrow to fix the tap.
Can you order a pizza by phone?
I don't have change; I only have large bills.
I want to open a savings account.
La peluquería está llena y necesito
The hair salon is full and I need an appointment.
The package arrived at the post office yesterday.
Can you give me a quote/budget for the renovation?
The garage/workshop is fixing my car.
I can't pay in cash right now.
What is the zip code of your address?
The on-call pharmacy is on this street.
I have a complaint about this product.
dictionary:
La cuenta - The bill (restaurant)
La factura - The invoice / bill (utility)
El cajero automático - The ATM
La tintorería - The dry cleaner
La ventanilla - The counter / service window
El banco - The bank
El carné de conducir - The driver's license
El total - The total
Cerrado/a - Closed
La tarjeta de regalo - The gift card
El fontanero - The plumber
El recibo - The receipt / bill
Pedir - To order / To ask for
El billete - The banknote / bill
Atención al cliente - Customer service
La cuenta de ahorros - The savings account
La cita - The appointment
Correos - The post office
El presupuesto - The quote / budget
El taller - The workshop / garage
Efectivo - Cash
El IVA - The VAT (tax)
El código postal - The zip code
Farmacia de guardia - On-call pharmacy
La queja - The complaint
